db:abstract.db:para: Native interface to a Wayland application.
This struct was introduced in Qt 6.5.

db:section.db:title: int *QWaylandApplication::compositor() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the wl_compositor that the application is using.

db:section.db:title: int *QWaylandApplication::display() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the wl_display that the application is using.

db:section.db:title: int *QWaylandApplication::keyboard() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the wl_keyboard belonging to seat() if available.

db:section.db:title: int *QWaylandApplication::lastInputSeat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the seat on which the last input event happened.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] uint QWaylandApplication::lastInputSerial() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the serial of the last input event on any seat.

db:section.db:title: int *QWaylandApplication::pointer() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the wl_pointer belonging to seat() if available.

db:section.db:title: int *QWaylandApplication::seat() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the seat associated with the default input device.

db:section.db:title: int *QWaylandApplication::touch() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the wl_touch belonging to seat() if available.
